name: Skater XL
description: From the people who brought you the #1 sports game world-wide for mobile, Skater XL is an evolution in skateboarding games. Experience unparalleled board control and responsiveness while you skate legendary real-world skate spots.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.5GHz dual core i5 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 950 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Please drop quality settings if not seeing 60FPS. This game is best played buttery smooth!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.5GHz quad core i5 or higher Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Consistent 58-60FPS on Ultra with these specs in beta testing.
